additional_info:
==== MyAnimeList.net - Night Theme PROTOTYPE ====

Testing version of style 7678
Current goal: None

Also note that the license for this version is set to No Redistribution.
My reason behind it: Don't speread something that doesn't work properly!
I will, however, welcome any feedback on this theme in the purpose of making it work.
When it does, these changes will be implemented into style 7678.
And thus be licensed under BY-NC-SA again. So help me out, okay! ;)
